keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters' Illegal Tactics
keyMoments.description: Hamburg uses iron gauntlets illegally during the Groggy Ring match, showing his willingness to cheat and fight dirty.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Hamburg as a combatant who will use any means to win, including weapons forbidden by the rules.

keyMoments.title: Size Attack S-M-L
keyMoments.description: Hamburg participates in the coordinated Size Attack S-M-L combination with Pickles and Big Pan.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hamburg's role in the Groggy Monsters' teamwork and combination attacks.

keyMoments.title: Monster Burger Attack
keyMoments.description: Hamburg uses two clubs in the devastating Monster Burger combination attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hamburg's most powerful team attack and his effectiveness as a combatant.

abilities.description: Hamburg uses his gorilla-like strength to throw opponents.
Three-person combination attack with Pickles and Big Pan where Hamburg punches the opponent with iron gauntlets.
Ultimate team attack where Hamburg uses concealed clubs alongside Pickles' swords and Big Pan's giant pans.

relationships.description: Hamburg fights alongside Pickles as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Hamburg coordinates with Pickles in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

relationships.description: Hamburg fights alongside Big Pan as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Hamburg coordinates with Big Pan in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters' Illegal Tactics
keyMoments.description: Pickles uses spiked shoulder pads illegally during the Groggy Ring match, demonstrating his role as the 'Tackle Machine.'
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Pickles' fighting style and willingness to use illegal weapons.

keyMoments.title: Size Attack S-M-L
keyMoments.description: Pickles participates in the coordinated Size Attack S-M-L combination, tackling opponents upward with his spiked shoulder pads.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Pickles' role as the middle component of the Groggy Monsters' combination attacks.

keyMoments.title: Monster Burger Attack
keyMoments.description: Pickles uses two swords in the devastating Monster Burger combination attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Pickles' most powerful team attack and his weapon proficiency.

abilities.description: Rotational attack combining offense and defense.
Three-person combination attack where Pickles rams the target upward with spiked shoulder pads.
Ultimate team attack where Pickles uses concealed swords alongside Hamburg's clubs and Big Pan's giant pans.

relationships.description: Pickles fights alongside Hamburg as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Pickles coordinates with Hamburg in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

relationships.description: Pickles fights alongside Big Pan as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Pickles coordinates with Big Pan in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

keyMoments.title: Groggy Monsters' Illegal Tactics
keyMoments.description: Big Pan uses various concealed weapons including giant pans, boot spikes, and an axe during the Groggy Ring match.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Big Pan as the powerhouse of the Groggy Monsters who uses his size and strength along with illegal weapons.

keyMoments.title: Size Attack S-M-L
keyMoments.description: Big Pan participates in the coordinated Size Attack S-M-L combination, slamming opponents into the ground with his giant palm.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Big Pan's role as the finishing component of the Groggy Monsters' combination attacks.

keyMoments.title: Monster Burger Attack
keyMoments.description: Big Pan uses two giant metal pans in the devastating Monster Burger combination attack, attempting to crush opponents.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Big Pan's most powerful team attack and his massive strength.

abilities.description: A passing technique utilizing Big Pan's size and strength.
A fighting technique performed by Big Pan.
Big Pan uses his slippery mudfish skin to evade attacks.
Three-person combination attack where Big Pan slams the target into the ground with his palm.
Ultimate team attack where Big Pan uses two giant metal pans to crush opponents.

relationships.description: Big Pan fights alongside Hamburg as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Big Pan coordinates with Hamburg in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

relationships.description: Big Pan fights alongside Pickles as part of the Groggy Monsters team.

evolutionMoments.description: Big Pan coordinates with Pickles in combination attacks during the Groggy Ring match.

reveals.information: Big Pan's slippery mudfish skin allows him to evade blunt attacks
